channel.title: personal on Sophie Bosio
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Sophie Bosio

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hi! I’m Sophie, a master’s student at the University of Oslo. I’m currently gearing up to write my MSc thesis, which will be about using program inversion to automatically derive good test input generators, hopefully making tools such as QuickCheck even more appealing to the average programmer. Besides functional programming, I’m a (budding) Emacs enthusiast with an above-average interest in coffee. When I’m not learning programming languages, I like to try my hand at learning natural ones.

item.title: Static Site Generation with Hugo
item.description: This website is built with Hugo and ox-hugo, an exporting engine that lets me write my posts in Org mode and then put it online easily.
